org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.convert
Class AWT2Geometry

java.lang.Object
  org.eclipse.gef4.geometry.convert.AWT2Geometry

public class AWT2Geometry
extends Object

Utility class to support conversions from AWT's geometry API to GEF4's geometry API.

Method Summary

Method Detail

toAffineTransform

public static AffineTransform toAffineTransform(AffineTransform t)
Converts a AWT AffineTransform into a GEF4 AffineTransform

Parameters:
t - the AffineTransform to transform
Returns:
a new AffineTransform representing an identical transformation

toLine

public static final Line toLine(Line2D l)
Converts a AWT Line2D into a GEF4 Line.

Parameters:
l - the Line2D to transform
Returns:
a new Line, which is constructed by using the start ( Line2D.getP1()) and end (Line2D.getP2()) points of the passed in Line2D

toPoint

public static final Point toPoint(Point2D p)
Converts a AWT Point2D into a GEF4 Point.

Parameters:
p - the Point2D to transform
Returns:
a new Point, which is constructed using the x and y values of the passed in Point2D

toPoints

public static Point[] toPoints(Point2D[] pts)
Converts a given array of AWT Point2Ds into a an array of GEF4 Points.

Parameters:
pts - the array of Point2Ds to transform
Returns:
an array containing new Points, which are constructed by using the x and y values of the passed in Point2Ds

toRectangle

public static final Rectangle toRectangle(Rectangle2D r)
Converts a AWT Rectangle2D into a GEF4 Rectangle. Note that the new Rectangle is simply constructed by using the values of the passed in Rectangle2D, not compensating the fact that the width and height of a rectangle are interpreted differently in Java2D and GEF4.

Parameters:
r - the Rectangle2D to convert
Returns:
a new Rectangle, which is constructed using the x, y, width, and height values of the passed in Rectangle2D.

toRoundedRectangle

public static RoundedRectangle toRoundedRectangle(RoundRectangle2D r)
Converts a AWT RoundRectangle2D into a GEF4 RoundedRectangle. Note that the new RoundedRectangle is simply constructed by using the values of the passed in RoundRectangle2D, not compensating the fact that the width and height of a rectangle are interpreted differently in Java2D and GEF4.

Parameters:
r - the RoundRectangle2D to convert
Returns:
a new RoundedRectangle, which is constructed using the x, y, width, height, arcWidth, and arcHeight values of the passed in RoundRectangle2D
